detailedRequirements:
Welcome to Pillar to Post - Quote Tool Respnosive UI Implementation Challenge! The goal of this challenge is to converT the HTML5 Prototypes for an applicaiton to Saelsforce pages. Salesforce pages should follow the prototype designs and styles.

NOTE: This application will use AngularJS Framework (http://angularjs.org, http://docs.angularjs.org/guide) and Bootstrap 3 (http://getbootstrap.com/getting-started). Please follow coding standards and write clean code for AngularJS data binding instead of using plain HTML code.

Have some questions related challenge requirements? Let's discuss on challenge forum!

Please read the challenge specification carefully and watch the forums for any questions or feedback concerning this challenge. It is important that you monitor any updates provided by the client or copilot in the forums. Please post any questions you might have for the client in the forums.

Challenge Description

Custom Labels

In order to provide maximum flexibility to the client all of the identified UI labels need to be retrieved from Custom Labels in Salesforce.

Custom Label Config Details

Short Description:  In most cases this can be the same as the value.  If the value is too long then some approximation of the value will do.

Name:  Prepend with “Quote”.  After that some reasonable approximation of the static text itself or of the purpose of the static text.

Examples:

1.  QuotePropInf

6.  QuoteHomeType

Categories:  Quote

Value:  Exact text from the mockup unless indicated otherwise in the notes.

Protected Component: False

The images below highlight each string of text that should be a custom label.  They are all numbered for easy reference (those are the numbers used in the naming example above from the Property Info section).  The notes below the image use the numbers for reference and also are a good way to check your counts to make sure you didn’t miss any labels.  There are 4 tabs to the application and an image is included for each.  The Property Info tab image is the one that includes the header and right hand panel labels.

Property Info

Note:  We need to add a required indicator on the following fields:

- Home Type, Sq Ft or Pricing, Property Address, (Conditionally year built see details in the implementation section)

- Once Home Type, Year Built (dynamically required see hasAgeTier() method), Sq Ft or Pricing, and Property Address are entered then the user can use the other tabs.  Until that point they should be inactive with the exception of the “Schedule” tab.

  • 7 - This label is good but this input box needs to be changed to text input and not a selection.
  • 8 & 9 - These are actually 2 different labels.  8 is “SQ. FT.” and 9 is “PRICING”.  These will be dynamically rendered and the details of that method are later in the document.  The $ in the text input box would only be appropriate if the PRICING type is returned from the method mentioned.
  • 15 - This label can have 3 places where it is rendered.  If there is no Buyer Agent (12) yet then the label would be under that label as it is for Seller Agent (13) and Other Contact (14).
  • 16 & 17 - These labels are similar to 15 in that they could be displayed in 3 places.  Where they are shown in the image and also under Seller Agent (13) and Other Contact (14) if either of those sections have a value.  Other Contact (14) is unique in the fact that there can be multiple Other Contacts so labels 15, 16, and 17 could all be shown if there was already a contact added.
  • 21 - Please make this Note / Comment section collapsable and default it to collapsed.  Only the Note / Comment label will be displayed when it is collapsed with the expand icon next to it.

Add a section below 21 that will essentially be a Softphone type layout displaying information about the person who has called.  Based on the value for Caller Type these fields will be dynamically rendered.  If it is a Realtor then all fields will be displayed but if it is a Consumer or other than just the name / number and caller type.

  • Franchise Name
  • Caller Name / Number
  • Caller Type
  • Referrals (This will be the number of referrals)
  • Buyer Agent (This will be the number of times as a buyer’s agent)
  • Seller Agent (This will be the number of times as a seller’s agent)
  • Recent Inspection

Clicking the Add Contact gives this screen.

  • 25 - This text needs to be changed to “Type name and search”.  There needs to be a search button added in the same style of the save button with the magnifying glass icon as it’s image.  Use best judgement on placement of this button.  Also an additional field needs to be displayed in this popup called “Brand”.  Please develop an icon for this in the same style as the ones being used.  This is a picklist type field with one of the options being “Other”.  Other would drive dynamic behavior.  Choosing other will result in another user enterable field to be displayed. Please add these features.

Packages & Services

 

Note:  Please notice the lists of green checkmark text that is under each package.  These list will be returned dynamically as you will see in the details in the implementation section.  However this section should be able to be collapsed for more senior resources that don’t need to see this information.  The design missed this detail.  Please use the collapsible Icon that is on the Summary Page (by the Property Information header on the right) on this tab in order to collapse that section.

  • 2, 3, & 4 - Will be used at the lower section of the page for the same labels.
  • 5 - Will be used for each header (i.e. Plus, Premium, and Prestige)
  • 6 & 7 - These labels are dynamic based on what is selected.  There can only be one selection at a time so selecting one should un-select the other (this needs to be fixed in the current code).  These labels are also used at the bottom of the Payment Breakdown section.  Also the selected package can be unselected meaning that no package is selected.  In that case see #12.
  • 11 - Clicking on the Add under Discounts section will give this screen.

 

  • 12 - If there is no package selected this entire row should be hidden as well as the row for #17.  There would only be one column of data instead of 3 since the only thing that could be displayed is added services and Coupons & Discounts.  See implementation details on how to get this data.
  • 13 - Also used under the Prestige heading.
  • 15, 16, 17, & 18 - We need to add a dynamic row for Tax in between Sub Total & Total. There can be two types of taxes Federal & State/Province. It should only be rendered if it’s applicable and defined on Franchise Agreement.  See the implementation section for details on the method call.
  • 19 - Change this label to be Manual Adjustment.
  • 20 - Change this label to be Adjustment Title.
  • 21 - Change this label to be Adjustment Amount.

There needs to be another picklist field between 21 and 22 called Reason Code(use label). Which will be *required, there will be a method that will return the values to be displayed in the field. The details for it are in Implementation section.

Schedule

  • 2 - This label text is incorrect.  It should read “Call Center Franchises”.  Also these sections need to be scrollable sections since the list rendered are dynamic in nature and could have 5 or 6 franchises listed.
  • 3 - Upon clicking this label there needs to be a dialog that is not in the design.  This dialog is a warning type dialog and it’s text should also be a label.  It should read “Changing franchises will reset this quote.  Are you sure?”  This dialog should follow the style of the page.  The functionality when clicking the “Yes” on the dialog will be discussed later in the document.
  • 4 - This label text is incorrect.  It should read “Other Franchises”.

 

Summary

This screen has a host of labels on it that have already been created in previous screens and will be reused here.  They are indicated by the yellow arrows.

A few of the Edit links should be removed as they should not be editable on this summary page.

  • Buyer Agent (Remove the Edit link but leave the Remove link)
  • Package
  • Franchise

Implementation Details

Auto Save

On focus change call the controller’s save() method

public QuoteObj save(QuoteObj)

 

The QuoteObj will be represented as displayed below.  For the purposes of this challenge you can hard code data into the controller and don’t have to worry about the data model at all.  Simply create the controller and the save method with this object structure and hard coded data.  The controller’s constructor will also return the QuoteObj object so all calls will be consistent.  Any values changed in the UI will need to be updated back into this structure and passed back to the save method.

 

* This is a value that will be queried in utility methods that you are not required to calculate or bother with.  Just mock up the data based on the screen shots and we will add the method implementation to get the actual values.  If there is no asterisk on the property the expectation is that you will be writing to that property in the UI.

 

Public class QuoteObj{

 String homeType;  //The actual chosen value for home type

 String yearBuilt;  //The typed in value for the year the home was built

 *Boolean yearBuiltRequired;  //flag to tell the UI if the year built field is a required field

 *String pricingType;  //metadata to tell if the pricing type is sq ft or home value.  This will drive the label

 String sqFt;  //The typed in sq foot value when the pricing type is sq ft

 String homeValue;  //The typed in home value when the pricing type is home value

 String propertyAddress;  //The typed in address

 List<Contact> contacts;  //A list of the buyer agent, seller agent, and any other contacts

 String customerName;  //The typed in customer name

 String customerEmail;  //The typed in customer email

 String customerPhone;  //The typed in customer phone

 String notes;  //The typed in notes / comments

 *String franchiseName;  //franchise name for the new “soft phone” layout

 *String callerName;  //caller name for the new “soft phone” layout

 *String callerNumber; //caller number for the new “soft phone” layout

 *String callerType;  //caller type for the new “soft phone” layout (i.e. realtor, consumer, other)

 *String numberOfReferrals;  //number of referrals the realtor calling in has

 *String numberOfBuyerAgent;   //number of times the realtor calling in has been a buyer agent

 *String numberOfSellerAgent;   //number of times the realtor calling in has been a seller agent

 *String recentInspectionAddress; //the address of the most recent inspection this realtor was involved with

 *List<Package> packages;

//this is a list of the three packages and all of the subsequent properties.  This list will be ordered so the //UI can be displayed properly Plus 0, Prestige 1, Premium 2.

 *List<AddedService> addedServices;

//this is the stand alone list of added services used to generate the added services box (#8 on //Packages and Services Screen) and the single column of added services selected in the Payment //Breakdown section.

 *List<Adjustment> adjustments; //this is the list of all possible adjustments

 *Boolean isInitialized;

//this will be used to save time in querying only the things that need to be queried after initial load.

 *String franchiseId; //the salesforce id for this franchise

 *String isInpectionRecord; //used to determine what type of object is created on save

 *List<String> homeTypeValues; //the list of possible values for home type

 *List<String> brandValues; //the list of possible values for brand on Add Contact pop up screen

 *List<String> reasonCodeValues;  

//the list of possible values for reason code on the Adjustment pop up screen

 *List<Franchise> franchises;  //the list of possible franchises for the zip code provided

}

 

Public class Contact{

 String contactType; //buyer agent, seller agent, other

 String name; //typed in value

 String email; //typed in value

 String phone; //typed in value

 String brand; //typed in value

}

 

Public class Package{

 *String name; //name to use in the display for package

 *String basePrice; //the base price of the package

 *String totalPrice;  //the total calculated price of the package, adjustments, and added services

 *String subTotal;  //the total of the basePrice and the added services base prices

 *String adjustmentTotal; //the total of all adjustments

 *String packageSavingsTotal; //the total of the selected added services discounts

 Boolean isSelected;  //user selection of the package

 *String addedServiceDiscountPct;  

//the discount percentage for this package displayed on the added services line in the Payment //Breakdown section

 *List<String> packageServices;  //the strings that are displayed under the package names

 List<AddedService> addedServices; //the added services that are currently selected

 Boolean addedServicesAdded;  //set this if a user adds an added service

 Boolean addedServicesRemoved;  //set this if a user removes an added service

}

 

Public class AddedService{

 Boolean isSelected;  //flag if the added service is selected

 *String basePrice;  //the base price of the added service

 *String discountedPrice;  

//the price for the added service with the package discount (only populated when the added service list //is a property of the package object

 *String standAlonePrice;  //the price if there is no package selected.  Only use this value in that case.

}

 

Public class Adjustment{

 *String name;

 *String adjustmentAmount;  //either this or adjustmentPct will be populated not both

 *String adjustmentPct;  //either this or adjustmentAmount will be populated not both

 Boolean isSelected;

 String reasonCode; //the selected reason code

}

 

Public class Franchise{

 String name;

 String id;

}
finalSubmissionGuidelines:
1. Solution should follow all above mentioned guidelines about the challenge requirements.
  2. Regularly monitor forums about decisions and new requirements.
  3. Submit a deployment guide to mention all steps and design decisions.
  4. Submit code base
  5. Provide following demos
    1. Code walk through
    2. Functionality demo
